mapper.insert: insert into funding values( seq_fno.nextval, #{id}, #{ftitle}, #{freward}, #{fcontent}, #{fcreator}, #{fcreatorInfo}, default, #{fgoal}, default, sysdate, #{endDate}, #{fileName} )
